question: You are currently trying to improve your knowledge of a language which is not your first language. You have a friend who speaks this language fluently. You have decided to write to this friend.Write a letter to your friend. In your letter,explain why you want to improve your knowledge of this languageask him/her for suggestions on how to learn more quicklypropose that you meet your friend to talk about it
text: Hope this letter finds you in radiant health and the best of your spirits. I am happy to tell you that I am learning your native language, French.

As you know, I have completed my graduation in Information Technology and now I am looking for a suitable job for me. I wanted to learn it  because it is expected that many French IT companies will set up their corporate offices in India in the coming two years and It is obvious that they would prefer people having knowledge of the French language.

Therefore, I have certain ways in my mind to learn it, one is I am thinking of joining a coaching institute and the other is to do self-study. What do you think is better? Can you suggest to me a good online learning platform like a website or a youtube channel? Your suggestions are much needed right now.
In fact, I was thinking of meeting with you for this discussion. Also, it's been a long to see, let's catch up this Sunday at 5 pm at Cofee Cafe Day. Let me know if you are available at that time.
Convey my regards to your parents
